trans-unit.source: Represents a column header for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 열 머리글을 나타내는 한 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A GridViewColumnHeader object is a button control that is derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>.
trans-unit.target: GridViewColumnHeader 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase> 에서 파생 된 단추 컨트롤

trans-unit.source: GridViewColumnHeader properties keep track of mouse events and the resizing of columns.
trans-unit.target: GridViewColumnHeader 속성 열 크기를 조정 하 고 마우스 이벤트는 추적.

trans-unit.source: Column headers in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode are GridViewColumnHeader objects.
trans-unit.target: 열 머리글에는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>보기 모드는 GridViewColumnHeader 개체.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You can customize GridViewColumnHeader objects by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes.
trans-unit.target: 다양 한 속성을이 클래스 및 관련된 클래스를 사용 하 여 GridViewColumnHeader 개체를 사용자 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 간의 우선 순위 및 이러한 속성에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 하십시오. [GridView 열 머리글 스타일 및 템플릿 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: A GridViewColumnHeader is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: GridViewColumnHeader은는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, 즉, 모든 형식 (예: 문자열, 이미지 또는 패널)의 단일 개체가 포함 될 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>클래스</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> 를 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> 연관 된는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> 이와 연결 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 식별자는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column%2A>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Responds when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 응답 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*>에 대 한는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref> 눌려질.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*>

trans-unit.source: The event arguments.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 인수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Responds to the creation of the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 시각적 트리 만들기에 응답의 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> and updates the floating version of the header when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 설정의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A>의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>부동 머리글의 버전을 업데이트 하 고 때 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole> 속성이</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A>

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> event for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 클래스에 대 한 처리를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"> </xref> 에 대 한 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event when a column is changing its position.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현은 발생 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>열 위치가 변경 되 면 이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: Provides an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 제공 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> 에 대 한 구현을 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref> event for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 클래스에 대 한 처리를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"> </xref> 에 대 한 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> implementation of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnLostKeyboardFocus%2A> clears mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>구현의 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnLostKeyboardFocus%2A>마우스 캡처를 지우는.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnLostKeyboardFocus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not change the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현은 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs> 의 속성이</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> 변경 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 데이터입니다.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter"></xref> event when the user pauses the mouse pointer on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 클래스에 대 한 처리를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter"> </xref> 에 마우스 포인터를 놓으면 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> event when the user drags a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> and its column to a new location in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> by using the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>사용자가을 끌 때 이벤트는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>과 해당 열에서 새 위치로 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>마우스를 사용 하 여.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>

trans-unit.source: To handle the event, the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs>로 설정 되어 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 데이터입니다.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"></xref> event when the mouse moves off the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 클래스에 대 한 처리를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"> </xref> 마우스 밖으로 이동 하는 경우 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave> event when the user drags a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> with the mouse from its old location, to move the header and its column.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave>사용자가을 끌 때 이벤트는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>머리글과 해당 열을 이동 하려면 이전 위치에서 마우스를 사용 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave>

trans-unit.source: To handle the event, the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs>로 설정 되어 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 데이터입니다.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref> event when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 클래스에 대 한 처리를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"> </xref> 에서 마우스 포인터를 일시 중지 하는 동안 마우스 왼쪽된 단추를 누를 때 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event so that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName> can support the drag-and-drop operation that moves a column.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>이벤트 있도록는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName>열을 이동 하는 끌어서 놓기 작업을 지원할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>

trans-unit.source: This method captures the mouse and sets the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> event argument to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드 캡처 마우스 및 집합은 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>이벤트 인수를 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 데이터입니다.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref> event when the user releases the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 클래스에 대 한 처리를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"> </xref> 에서 마우스 포인터를 일시 중지 하는 동안 마우스 왼쪽된 단추를 놓으면 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event (which occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> is set to `true`).
trans-unit.target: 이 구현 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>이벤트 (발생 때는 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>속성에는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs>로 설정 되어 `true`).</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>

trans-unit.source: It also ends the mouse capture that was set by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 또한 마우스 캡처에 의해 설정 된 종료는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: This provides a way for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to support the drag-and-drop operation that moves a column.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 방법을 제공는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName>열을 이동 하는 끌어서 놓기 작업을 지원 하도록.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> event argument to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 설정의 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>이벤트 인수를 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 데이터입니다.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref> event that occurs when the user moves the mouse within a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 클래스에 대 한 처리를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"> </xref> 내에서 마우스를 이동할 때 발생 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation keeps the left mouse button in a pressed state while a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> is moved by a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현 하는 동안 누른된 상태에서 마우스 왼쪽된 단추를 유지 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>끌어서 놓기 작업으로 이동 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: This also causes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> to remain set to `true` when the mouse with its left mouse button pressed moves off the header.
trans-unit.target: 이 인해는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>에 설정 된 상태로 유지 `true` 마우스 왼쪽된 단추를 사용 하 여 마우스 눌렀음을 헤더 밖으로 이동 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>

trans-unit.source: This implementation keeps the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> event argument set to `false` for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event so that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method can support the drag-and-drop operation that moves a column.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현은 유지는 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>로 설정 하는 이벤트 인수 `false` 에 대 한는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>이벤트 있도록는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드 열을 이동 하는 끌어서 놓기 작업을 지원할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 데이터입니다.

trans-unit.source: Responds to a change in <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref> dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 변경에 응답 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref> 차원.

trans-unit.source: Information about the change in the size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 크기 변경에 대 한 정보는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the role of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 역할을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter> class performs layout for the column headers in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> and places an additional column header at the end to add space.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter>의 열 머리글에 대 한 레이아웃을 수행 하는 클래스는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>추가 열 머리글에 공백을 추가 하려면 끝에 배치 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter>

trans-unit.source: A Role value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole> identifies this column header in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole>이 열 헤더 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole> 역할 값

trans-unit.source: A Role value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole> identifies a column that is currently the object of a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 역할 값 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole>열은 현재는 끌어서 놓기 작업의 개체를 식별 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the current role of the column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole"> </xref> 열의 현재 역할을 지정 하는 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 식별자는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to serialize a <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Serialize 할 것인지 결정 한 <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method applies to the following dependency properties: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelectorProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.StyleProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipProperty>
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 다음과 같은 종속성 속성에 적용 됩니다.- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelectorProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.StyleProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipProperty></xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipProperty> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.StyleProperty> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelectorProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateProperty>

trans-unit.source: The dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 종속성 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref> must be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref> 고, 그렇지 않으면 직렬화 해야 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.
